title: Llama
description:
A llama, a long-necked, camel-like animal, native to South America and used for transport and wool. Depicted as a shaggy white, light-brown, or multicolored llama in full profile on all fours facing left.

May be used to represent an alpaca or related animals.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the llama emoji stands with a gentle, curious posture, its plush woolly coat depicted with soft, rounded edges and subtle gradients that give it a cuddly, approachable appearance. Its large, expressive eyes, a signature of Apple's character design, convey a sense of calm and amiability. This emoji on Apple devices is perfect for conveying a sense of gentle nature, a touch of whimsy, or a friendly greeting, bringing a unique charm to digital conversations.
